div.ab: zōt: Anklesaria, Kotwal and Boyd, Geldner.

Commentary.ab: Y13.1b parə̄ṇdīm] Geldner, Ir. mss.; Kellens parəṇdīm. Cf. with YAv. pārəṇdi- (vid. VytS2.3, S1.25, S2.25, etc.). However VrS18.3 parəṇdi- / parə̄ṇdi- well attested. Narten, 1986 pp. 206-210 parəṇdi- with bibliography. De Vaan, 2003 p. 63, where he states initial pā- as a lengthening from pa-, comparing with lengthening in pāraiia- and pārəṇtara-.

RecitationInstructions.ab: ahurəm mazdą̇m] ahurəm mazdą̇m ā.mruiiē OD yaϑā tū.ī (Y13.5) 40.

Parallels.ab: γə̄nąnąm ratūm āmruiiē daēnąm māzdaiiasnīm aṣ̌īm vaŋᵛhīm parə̄ṇdīm ~ Y38.1 - Y38.2 imąm āat̰ ząm gənābīš haϑrā yazamaidē yā.nā̊ baraitī yā̊sca tōi gənā̊ ... yazamaidē ... ābīš aṣ̌īm vaŋᵛhīm ... parə̄ṇdīm yazamaidē.
ratūm āmruiiē = Y13.2 (x3), Y13.3; ~ VrS11.13 ratūš āmrūmaide.
γə̄nąnąm ... yąmcā bipaitištanąm aṣ̌aōnīm ~ VS15.19 vīspā̊ hāirišīš frašnaōiti bipaitištanaca caϑβarə.paitištanaca.
